nodes.text: Bastion Princess was a cruise liner that journeyed from Bastion to Gagrew Station in Hutt Space as of 44 ABY. It was almost kilometer long in a shape of diamond and painted in deep blue. It was boarded by Wraith Squadron during this time, who sabotaged its hyperdrive and fled in an escape pod as part of a ruse to seize an Imperial warship. It served butter pastries as part of its breakfast.
